## GetProps type

Infers prop type from component C

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type GetProps<C> = C extends React.ComponentType<infer P> ? C extends React.ComponentClass<P> ? React.ClassAttributes<InstanceType<C>> & P : P : never;
```
